title: Circular motion - two satellites orbiting Earth

content.question: Two satellites are orbiting Earth in circular orbits. Satellite <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math> has a mass <math alttext="m sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>, orbital period <math alttext="T sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>, and orbital radius <math alttext="R sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math>. Satellite <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math> has a mass <math alttext="2 m sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>, orbital period <math alttext="2 T sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>T</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math>, and orbital radius <math alttext="R sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>. What is the ratio <math alttext="the fraction with numerator R sub B, and denominator R sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>R</mi><mmultiscripts><mrow></mrow><mprescripts></mprescripts><mtext>B</mtext><none></none></mmultiscripts></mrow><msub><mi>R</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></mfrac></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="4 to the one third power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msup><mn>4</mn><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></msup></math>

<math alttext="2 times, open parenthesis, 4 to the one third power, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><msup><mn>4</mn><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></msup></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="4 to the one third power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msup><mn>4</mn><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></msup></math>

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
